release dates: South Africa::1 June 2018                            (Encounters Documentary Film Festival)

1.title: September
1.plot: Each year hundreds of international brands shoot their advertising campaigns in the idyllic city of Cape Town. This documentary series follows a group of American, British and Brazilian fashion models who travel to the city to cash in on the summer season. Each episode delves into the reality of their day-to-day interactions as they attempt to find work, friends and build their careers over a 3 month period. Featuring appearances from The model Agency's Carole White and America's Next Top Model's Aminat Ayinde, the show offers viewers a true reality check on the ...

2.title: The Test
2.plot: The agency organizes a 'test' for the models with sought after Cape Town photographer Marnus Meyer. Ben takes advantage of the situation by bringing along some of his own designs for the shoot. But not everyone appears to be at their best on the day. Later the group have their first social outing together as they watch Michael walk the runway at Shimmy Beach nightclub.

3.title: Money
3.plot: Michael reveals the real reason he's brought an 'assistant' with him for the trip. Ben finally has his moment to cast for GQ magazine while the girls have their first meetings with Elle, Marie Claire and Glamour. It becomes clear that each model has their own reasons for coming to Cape Town and one model suddenly realizes that the stakes have become much higher than they had previously thought.

4.title: Friends
4.plot: Anna shoots for Marie Claire with Brazilian model-turned-photographer Higor Bastos. Michael tries out his acrobatic skills on an e-com shoot. Meanwhile Rochana makes a connection with a male model while shooting Women's Health on Clifton Beach. Ben gets good news after a much anticipated first surf lesson while Michelle wonders if her height may be holding her back.

5.title: The Newcomer
5.plot: The group have their first experiences with commercial castings - with varying degrees of success. Meanwhile Michelle isn't happy about the appearance of a newcomer in the girl's model apartment. Michael gets a job that could change his financial situation, but may effect his relationship.

-1.title: September
-1.plot: It's one of the busiest months on the world's fashion calendar and the start of season in Cape Town. We meet the models who have been selected by Twenty Model Management to work in the city for 3 months. Anna the Brazilian experiences her first 'go see' with Women's Health, while 26-year-old American Michael shows off his self-taught 'walk' for the organizers of the Men's Health Summer Fashion Show. Meanwhile 20-year-old Brit Rochana appears to be having second thoughts about the trip.

imdb.title: The Beautiful People
plot: Five Models. Three Months. One City.::Nicky Greenwall
